Uses of Class
powergrid.tasks.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    powergrid.control  
    powergrid.plugins  
    powergrid.tasks  
    powergrid.view  

    • Uses of Task in powergrid.control

      Methods in powergrid.control that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task TaskManager.checkNextTask()
      Returns, but does not remove, the first Task in the TaskManager.
      Task TaskManager.currentTask()
      returns the currently running task.
      Task TaskManager.retrieveTask()
      Removes and returns the next Task from the TaskManager.
      Methods in powergrid.control with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean TaskManager.assignTask(Task t)
      Assigns a Task to the TaskManager.
      boolean TaskManager.assignTask(Task t, int priority)
      Assigns a Task to the TaskManager with the speicified priority.

    • Uses of Task in powergrid.plugins

      Methods in powergrid.plugins that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends Task>> Plugin.getPublicTasks()
      This method is executed by PowerGrid after the setUp() and onLoad() methods have been called.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends Task>> PowerGridPlugin.getPublicTasks() 

    • Uses of Task in powergrid.tasks

      Subclasses of Task in powergrid.tasks 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActiveScriptTask
      Task that runs an ActiveScript instance inside of PowerWalk as if it where running in RSBot.
      class  RestTask
      Creates a Task that rests the local Player.
      class  ReturnTask
      Executes a given Task and then returns to the position you were before the Task was executed.
      class  StepTask
      Represents a Task that can be split in a number of similar tasks.
      class  TravelNearestTask
      Calculates a path to the nearest position matching certain criteria and walks it.
      class  TravelTask
      This Task travels to the given destination using all available methods.
      Methods in powergrid.tasks that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task TaskDeque.getFirst()
      Returns the first Task in the Deque.
      Task TaskDeque.getLast()
      Returns the last Task in the Deque.
      Methods in powergrid.tasks with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskDeque.append(Task t)
      Adds a Task to the end of this Deque.
      int Task.compareTo(Task t)
      Returns the difference in Priority between this Task and Task t
      void TaskDeque.prepend(Task t)
      Adds a task to the beginning of this Deque.
      Constructors in powergrid.tasks with parameters of type Task 
      Constructor and Description
      ReturnTask(Task t)
      Creates a new ReturnTask that executes the given Task and then makes its way back to the original position.
      Constructor parameters in powergrid.tasks with type arguments of type Task 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskDeque(java.util.Collection<? extends Task> tasks)
      Creates a TaskDeque filled with the given tasks.
